page.title: 13Family Life
page.content: In my family's sparetime, we usually just sit and read the paper or watch TV. Mum often gets us together to work in the garden. Sometimes we go out in the car to visit friends or relatives. Some families go out jogging or cycling along the country roads. My family likes riding across the fields. It can be a great pleasure if you just take it easy. It is not a good idea to try jumping over 10 ft walls. When we were young we played games of pretend. We would pretend to be heroes from TV programmes, like He-Man and the Master of the Universe. We also played at families. There would be a Dad, Mum, baby and the daughter zooming off with her boy friend on his motor bike or wee sports car.
